entry.tran: （小说、戏剧或电影中的）反英雄，非正统派主角
entry.def: An anti-hero is the main character in a novel, play, or film who is not morally good and does not behave like a typical hero.

means.word_mean: 1. a protagonist who lacks the characteristics that would make him a hero (or her a heroine)
